title: Thank You for Your Service: Creating a Persistent Isolated Windows Service
description: Windows Services are powerful little beasts and encountering them is unavoidable when developing under Windows

title: Analyzing and Customizing the Detailed Mechanisms of WPF Slider Control
description: This exploration into the WPF Slider control aims to provide a deep understanding of how WPF designs its controls and their internal mechanisms. While it's nearly impossible to delve into every WPF control's internals due to the vast source code, there's no urgent need to worry or complain.

title: ChatGPT API in C# WPF / XAML / MVVM
description: Implement ChatGPT API in C# WPF with GPT3.5-turbo
